text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The latter years of Japan's Edoperiod saw a classic poetry anthologyrefashioned with a twist: the Umamusume Hundred Poets.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Collecting verses both by and about<n>Umamusume, it serves
as a valuable<n>window into their lives, from daily<n>routine to
romance.

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: So, we're divining a way to make thenew year happy for all! That iswhat you wanted, right?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Yes. I... I've spent this whole year<n>being a screwup and
causing tons of<n>trouble for everyone...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: So next year, I-I want to be someonewho makes others happy. I knowthat sounds... laughable coming from me, but...

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
No, no, I'm not laughing at all. It's a<n>noble goal, if you ask
me!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Besides, a happy new year sounds<n>good to me too, so I'm
happy to help<n>however I can! Now then, let's get to<n>
divining!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Fimbally... mimbally... Awe-awe...<n>mubble-maw!

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: EIYAHHHH! EEEEEEEEP!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Ohh, we have an auspicious sign!<n>Thank you, Shiraoki! From
the<n>northeast it comes—visions of tatami!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: In the coming year, should you joinforces with friends and endeavor incompetition, great, great fortuneawaits!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: A-a-anyway, th-that's why I gathered<n>you guys here.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
A team competition! I'm excited<n>already! What are we
gonna play?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text: Glad you asked... Ta-da! Check it out!It's the New Year's tradition, theUmamusume Hundred Poetskaruta championship!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Ooh, karuta! Long have our<n>forerunners sent cards flying
and set<n>mats ablaze in the heat of<n>competition—or so the
legends say!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Oh, I've seen that on TV! Karuta's the<n>game where
everyone races to grab<n>those big cards, right?

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Yep, that's the one! Teams of<n>Umamusume meet in a grand
arena to<n>run and run—run amok, even! Ah, the<n>joys of
tradition!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
To be honest, I had no idea what kind<n>of competition I could
enter with<n>friends... so I went to Tazuna for<n>advice.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: And then...

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Excellent! Your drive to start the year<n>off honing your skills
is truly<n>admirable!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Thus, a proposal! Say, Tazuna, that<n>New Year's tradition is
still going, isn't<n>it?

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text:
Yes. ♪ She means the URA-sponsored<n>National Umamusume
Karuta<n>Championship.

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: In Umamusume karuta, oversizedcards featuring the HundredPoets are arranged in a spaciousarena, where teams of four face eachother.

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text:
You can sign up through the academy,<n>so if you'd like to
compete, and have<n>at least four members, I'd be happy<n>to
register your team. ♪

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Umamusume karuta is a test of<n>speed, knowledge, and
teamwork. A<n>demanding sport indeed, which is<n>perhaps
why participation has<n>declined in recent years...

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
But fear not! We will ensure that you<n>are well-practiced,
properly registered,<n>and well-dressed! Best of luck!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Haaah ha ha ha! Magnificent! The<n>curtains rise on a new
year to reveal a<n>numinous new overlord and her<n>
entourage—broadcast live for all to<n>see!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: That sounds fun! Let's do it, let's do<n>it!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Yes, I like the enthusiasm! This is a<n>sure way to ring in
happiness, so I<n>say we waste no time in signing up!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
Our team will be named... Oh, I<n>know—Team Great Fortune in
the New<n>Year!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
(Th-that's a relief... I wasn't sure<n>they'd be willing to
join...)

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
(Now I just have to not screw<n>anything up and be useful... I
can't<n>"join forces" without first being a<n>force myself!)

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Ah...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
(It's Ayabe! She always lets me train<n>with her, even though
I just end up<n>tripping and wasting her time...)

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: (I... I want to repay her too!)

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Um... A-A-Ayabe! Do you, um, maybe<n>have a moment?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Doto? What is it?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
So, you see, um... for New Year's, me,<n>Fukukitaru, and a
couple others are<n>competing in a karuta tournament.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
My fortune said competing together<n>will bring us all
happiness, so I was<n>wondering if you wanted to join too...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
This past year, me being such a<n>screwup has caused you a
bunch of<n>trouble, so...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: I want to bring happiness to you too!

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: Doto...

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: ...Sorry, but I'll pass.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Wha?

text_block_list.name: Admire Vega
text_block_list.text: I want to focus on racing right now,<n>so... See you.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Ah... Ayabe...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
(D-did I make her mad? I'm probably<n>the last person she
wants any sort of<n>invitation from...)
